name: Looped Crafter (LD51)
description:
Gave created for Ludum Dare 51: Every 10 seconds

Controls:
Move - RMB
Place object - LMB
Interact/Pick Up - E

Unfortunatelly I didn't have as much time as I would have liked, so didn't get to finish this. There is a bunch of things missing and it's simply just a test level right now, but I still wanted to upload it, since I am actually happy with the base system for items and machines. If you decide to give it a try, I happy to hear any and all feedback, just be warned, this is barely a prototype. 

Every 10 seconds all of the resources in the world get reset. You can pick up and gather resoruces (chop down trees and mine rock). Use these to create crafting stations and make more complex resources. Each machine has a second on which it will actiave, changing this by gettting close to and interacting with the machine. The goal is to craft the door using 10 end game parts.
